properties.description: Generic person types defined by CWRC.
properties.title: Person Type

properties.description: Select one or more projects to associate the present entity record.
properties.title: Project

properties.description: Provide the person's standard name, and for persons, by part if desired; if person entities are not broken out by parts of a name (given and family) and appear as one string in the namePart element, then family name (last name or surname) should appear first, followed by a comma, followed by first or given names. Person name examples: with name parsing: Joyce Carol (given) Oates (family); without name parsing: Oates, Joyce Carol.
properties.title: Preferred Name(s)

properties.description: Select a type of name part from the list.
properties.title: Name Type

properties.description: Provide the person's standard name.
properties.title: Preferred name

properties.description: Record one or more alternative names here. Examples: with name parsing: Mary Shelley's birth name: Godwin (family), Mary Wollstonecraft (given); without name parsing: Mary Shelley's birth name: Godwin, Mary Wollstonecraft.
properties.title: Variant Name(s)

properties.description: Select a type of variant type from the list.
properties.title: Variant Type

properties.description: Select a type of name part from the list.
properties.title: Name Type

properties.description: Provide the person's alternative name.
properties.title: Variant name

properties.description: By selecting a certainty level you can specify an approximate degree of confidence on a given piece of information about this entity.
properties.title: Certainty

properties.description: Enter a URI to a linked data resource that is the same as this entity (e.g., a VIAF record).
properties.title: Same As

properties.description: By selecting a certainty level you can specify an approximate degree of confidence on a given piece of information about this entity.
properties.title: Certainty

properties.description: Select a date of existence from the date picker.
properties.title: Date

properties.description: Captures a date type in relation to its association with the entity described.
properties.title: Date Type

properties.description: Factuality captures whether or not the entity (person, organization, or place) is real, fictional, or both (i.e., a mixture of both real and fictional).
properties.title: Factuality

properties.description: By selecting a certainty level you can specify an approximate degree of confidence on a given piece of information about this entity.
properties.title: Certainty

properties.description: An optional field to capture gender terms the present person is associated with.
properties.title: Gender

properties.description: By selecting a certainty level you can specify an approximate degree of confidence on a given piece of information about this entity.
properties.title: Certainty

properties.description: This field can capture relevant paid occupations held by the person described in the present record.
properties.title: Occupation

properties.description: By selecting a certainty level you can specify an approximate degree of confidence on a given piece of information about this entity.
properties.title: Certainty

properties.description: The activity field captures all unpaid work or function such as volunteer work or other significant activity that a person was engaged in. Example: parenting, unpaid domestic labour, nursing, as well as philanthropic, missionary, or other political activities.
properties.title: Activity

properties.description: By selecting a certainty level you can specify an approximate degree of confidence on a given piece of information about this entity.
properties.title: Certainty

properties.description: This field can capture a topic of interest to the person entity.
properties.title: Research Interest

properties.description: Enter a descriptive note about the present entity.
properties.title: Note

properties.description: A source of evidence used in describing the entity or entities instances. Equivalent to EAC-CFPF's source element.
properties.title: Resource
